tool_description: Tracks and analyzes performance metrics of different content types and formats across social media platforms to identify successful patterns.

content_type.description: Type of content to analyze (video, image, carousel, story, reel, live, text)

platform.description: Platform for performance analysis (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube)

account_size.description: Account size category (micro, mid, macro, mega)

error_messages: Invalid content type: Use one of [video, image, carousel, story, reel, live, text].
Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube].
Invalid account size: Use one of [micro, mid, macro, mega, all].
Insufficient performance data: Not enough data available for specified parameters.
usage: Specify content_type, platform, and timeframe. Optionally filter by niche and account_size. Returns performance metrics and benchmarking data.

average_engagement_rate.description: Average engagement rate percentage for this content type

top_performing_topics.description: Topics that perform best with this content type

optimal_posting_times.description: Best times to post this content type
